channel.title: How to edit welcome message
channel.description:
I am using Ihybrid. This is my first time with PI. How do I edit the "Welcome to Ihybrid" Join these forums etc.
PLEASE HELP ME.
Matt

item.title: How to edit welcome message
item.dc:creator: @nolzan nolzan
item.description:
@nolzan wrote:

You go into client.java then look for something similar to this:

teleportToY = 0; } if (playerRights == 0) { sm("Welcome to dragzscape"); sm("Info on becoming mod type ::modinfo"); sm("Type ::rules for the server rules. Don't say you didn't know them"); sm("Type ::Starter To Begin"); sm("Server Created By owner jamie"); sm("::skillshelp for help on skillz :)"); sm("try the suggest code to suggest updates - ::suggest (your suggestion)"); newWelc(); } if (playerRights == 1) { sm("Welcome to dragzscape"); sm("try the suggest code to suggest updates - ::suggest (your suggestion)"); sm("Type ::rules for the server rules. Don't say you didn't know them ;]"); sm("Your a Mod... Respect your moderator status"); sm("Server Created By owner jamie"); newWelc(); } if (playerRights == 2) { sm("Welcome to dragzscape"); sm("Watch over the youngin's"); sm("Type ::rules for the server rules. Don't say you didn't know them ;]"); sm("Your an Admin... Respect your administrative status"); sm("Server Created By owner jamie"); newWelc(); } if (playerRights == 3) { sm("Welcome to dragzscape"); sm("Go Own some Noobs owner"); sm("::xrichie to get unlimited money"); sm("Server Created By owner jamie"); newWelc(); } if (playerRights == 4) { sm("Welcome to dragzscape"); sm("You're a hidden Administrator, shhh."); sm("Type ::rules for the server . Don't say you didn't know them ;]"); sm("You have all the abilities of a normal Administrator."); sm("Server Created By owner jamie"); newWelc(); } if (playerRights == 10) { sm("Welcome to dragzscape"); sm("You're a hidden Co-Owner, shhh."); sm("::xrichie to get unlimited money"); sm("Server Created By owner jamie"); newWelc(); Then edit where it has the " " for example:

teleportToY = 0; } if (playerRights == 0) { sm("Welcome to test system message"); sm("Info on becoming mod type ::modinfo"); sm("Type ::rules for the server rules. Don't say you didn't know them"); sm("Type ::Starter To Begin"); sm("Server Created By owner jamie"); sm("::skillshelp for help on skillz :)"); sm("try the suggest code to suggest updates - ::suggest (your suggestion)"); newWelc(); } if (playerRights == 1) { sm("Welcome to your server example"); sm("try the suggest code to suggest updates - ::suggest (your suggestion)"); sm("Type ::rules for the server rules. Don't say you didn't know them ;]"); sm("Your a Mod... Respect your moderator status"); sm("Server Created By owner jamie"); newWelc(); } if (playerRights == 2) { sm("Welcome to hi"); sm("Watch over the youngin's"); sm("Type ::rules for the server rules. Don't say you didn't know them ;]"); sm("Your an Admin... Respect your administrative status"); sm("Server Created By owner jamie"); newWelc(); } if (playerRights == 3) { sm("Welcome to example"); sm("Go Own some Noobs owner"); sm("::xrichie to get unlimited money"); sm("Server Created By owner jamie"); newWelc(); } if (playerRights == 4) { sm("Welcome to your server"); sm("You're a hidden Administrator, shhh."); sm("Type ::rules for the server . Don't say you didn't know them ;]"); sm("You have all the abilities of a normal Administrator."); sm("Server Created By owner jamie"); newWelc(); } if (playerRights == 10) { sm("Welcome to your server"); sm("You're a hidden Co-Owner, shhh."); sm("::xrichie to get unlimited money"); sm("Server Created By owner jamie"); newWelc(); then compile and run
